headline: Celsius Holdings (CELH) Revamps Marketing Leadership With New CMO And Brand Vision
summary: Celsius Holdings (CELH) recently appointed Rishi Daing as Chief Marketing Officer and formed a new Marketing Leadership Team, indicating a strong focus on brand development and market presence. Over the last quarter, Celsius achieved a 37% price increase, which aligns well with their strategic partnership enhancements with PepsiCo, including a $585 million investment and acquisition of Rockstar Energy. These developments likely added momentum amidst a generally upward market trend marked by...

headline: Trian Partners Co-CIO Josh Frank to Keynote 5th Palm Beach CorpGov Forum
summary: We are pleased to announce that Trian Fund Management Partner and Co-Chief Investment Officer Josh Frank will join as our keynote speaker on Nov. 6 at the 5th Annual Palm Beach CorpGov Forum. Mr. Frank, who has been a director of Janus Henderson Group plc since 2023, has played a leadership role in many of […] The post Trian Partners Co-CIO Josh Frank to Keynote 5th Palm Beach CorpGov Forum appeared first on CorpGov.

headline: Celsius Holdings Names Chief Marketing Officer and Announces Marketing Leadership Appointments
summary: BOCA RATON, Fla., September 08, 2025--Celsius Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: CELH) today announced the appointment of Rishi Daing as Chief Marketing Officer, effective today. The company also established a new Marketing Leadership Team, including Chief Brand Officer and Chief Creative Officer roles, to advance its portfolio growth strategy.

raw.headline: Celsius Holdings Names Chief Marketing Officer and Announces Marketing Leadership Appointments
raw.summary: BOCA RATON, Fla., September 08, 2025--Celsius Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: CELH) today announced the appointment of Rishi Daing as Chief Marketing Officer, effective today. The company also established a new Marketing Leadership Team, including Chief Brand Officer and Chief Creative Officer roles, to advance its portfolio growth strategy.

headline: Celsius bolsters C-suite with brand and creative officer roles
summary: The energy drink maker's CEO said the appointments will help grow its namesake beverage, plus the recently acquired Alani Nu and Rockstar, "from big brands into mega brands."
